articles.title: Results of Group G Matches for 2018 AFC U-23 Championship Qualifiers (3)
articles.content:
Results of Group G Matches for 2018 AFC U-23 Championship Qualifiers (3)
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Group G matches for the 2018 AFC U-23 Championship Qualifiers came to a close at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Following are the results of Sunday matches.
					
					 DPRK 6: 0 Laos
					
					 Hong Kong of China 4: 0 Taipei of China
					
					 Standings of Group G (tabulated under matches played, won, draw, lost, goals for, goals against, points):
					
					1. DPRK: 3, 2, 1, 0, 14-2,  7
					
					2. Hong Kong of China: 3, 1, 2, 0, 6-2, 5
					
					3. Laos: 3, 1, 1, 1, 4-8, 4
					
					4. Taipei of China: 3, 0, 0, 3, 2-14,  0
					
					 The DPRK team took the first place to be qualified for the 2018 AFC U-23 Championship.

articles.title: Korea National Insurance Corporation Marks 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Korea National Insurance Corporation Marks 70th Birthday
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Korea National Insurance Corporation celebrated the 70th founding anniversary.
					 The corporation is associated with the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. They advanced the Juche-oriented ideology and theory of building insurance, founded the first genuine insurance institution for the people and energetically led the work to ensure that the institution contributes to promoting the well-being of the people.
					
					 The corporation has been developed into a powerful economic means which can contribute to the building of socialist economy and the independent and creative life of the working people for the past 70 years, fully displaying its popular nature as insurance under socialism.
					
					 It has a number of branches across the country and widely conducts the work to protect the properties of all the sectors of national economy and the lives of the people.
					
					 It has also ensured the normalization of production and management activities and promoted the living of the people by assessing the damage by all sorts of natural disasters and accidents including flood and drought in good time and quickly and accurately paying compensation for the damage.
					
					 A meeting marking the 70th anniversary of the corporation took place on Sunday.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet NA for Hurting Social System in DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet NA for Hurting Social System in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet National Assembly adopted a "resolution" taking issue with the DPRK's test-launch of ICBM.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says that this brought to light once again the treacherous nature of the puppet NA as it has committed crimes against the compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces while serving the master U.S.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "resolution" adopted at the puppet NA is no more than a reckless provocation of the political philistines who revealed their sinister intention to take advantage of the U.S. sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK to the last.
					
					 But, this is little short of strangling by themselves. Gone are the days never to return when the puppet forces could run amuck by relying on the U.S. 
					
					 Those who are hurting the compatriots by relying on outside forces and making desperate efforts to attain the sinister purpose while creating confrontation and distrust can never go scot-free.
					
					 The Trump administration is rebuffed in its mainland and other parts of the world. The puppet NA would pay a very high price for daring challenge the social system of the DPRK while having lingering attachment to the Trump administration's anachronistic policy towards the DPRK, the commentary warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Probing Truth behind Influence-Peddling in "State Affairs"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Probing Truth behind Influence-Peddling in "State Affairs"
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an editorial on July 21 in connection with the fact that Chongwadae documents dealing with influence-peddling in "state affairs" committed by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors were disclosed. 
					 The editorial said that documents worked out in the period of the Park regime at Chongwadae were massively disclosed, adding that they were highly likely to contain evidence proving influence-peddling in "state affairs".
					
					 It urged the prosecution to probe the truth behind the influence-peddling in "state affairs" by increasing manpower, not for stopping to reinforce evidence for the trial at present.

articles.title: S. Korean Army Soldier Commits Suicide
articles.content:
S. Korean Army Soldier Commits Suicide
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A soldier of the 22nd Division of the south Korean puppet army took his own life on July 19, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 He was reported to opt for suicide since he suffered ceaseless violence and abuses from his superiors.
					
					 In last May, a lady officer of the headquarters of the puppet navy hanged herself owing to the sexual violence from her superior.

articles.title: Improved Treatment of Young Working People Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Improved Treatment of Young Working People Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea carried an editorial on July 21.
					 The editorial denounced the employers for dismissing young people and driving them to death as they called for ensuring the minimum wage.
					
					 It stressed that employers should improve the conditions of young working people before grievances were voiced for the hike of minimum wages.

articles.title: Spokesmen for Organizations of Koreans in China Call for Repatriating DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Spokesmen for Organizations of Koreans in China Call for Repatriating DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesmen for the General Association of Koreans in China and its afflicted Liaoning Regional Association made statements on July 12 and 13 urging the south Korean puppet forces to repatriate DPRK women citizens who were abducted and held in custody.
					 The statements said that the south Korean authorities refused the repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui and 12 women citizens of the DPRK who are calling for repatriation, claiming that "they came to south Korea to settle there at their will" and "there is no reason to repatriate them to the north in view of the present law".
					
					 If the south Korean authorities sincerely respect their will, Kim Ryon Hui and 12 DPRK's women citizens should be sent back home as they demanded, the statements noted.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Lectures, round-table talks and reading sessions were held in Bangladesh, Iran, France, Romania, Mexico, Tanzania, Guinea, Zambia, Angola and Nigeria between June 27 and July 8 to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairperson of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said that the Korean people are praising the President as the tender-hearted father, noting that his image as the father of the people will be always cherished in the minds of humankind.
					
					 The chairman of the France-Korea Friendship Association said the revolutionary career of the President was the life of a peerlessly great man who devoted himself to Korea's independence and socialist construction, national reunification and global independence and that his line of building a country independent in politics, self-sufficient in economy and self-reliant in national defence has clearly proved its validity and vitality in an acute confrontation with imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism lauded the President for leading the revolution and construction to victory and glory, enjoying absolute support and trust from the people, possessed of outstanding ideology and leadership and noble virtues for a long period.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups praised the President as an elder statesman of world politics and the distinguished great man who explored and glorified the era of independence, noting that the exploits he performed before the times and history would shine forever.
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria stressed that the DPRK could dynamically push forward with socialist construction despite all challenges of imperialists, because the President laid firm foundations for independence, self-reliance and self-defence with his lifelong devotion to the country and its people.

articles.title: Russian Committee Inaugurated to Praise Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Russian Committee Inaugurated to Praise Great Persons of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A Russian committee for revering President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk were formed in Moscow on July 17.
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed in Guinea, Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed in Guinea, Nepal
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Personages from Guinea and Nepal on July 7 made public statements in congratulation of the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 in the DPRK.
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said:
					
					 The world progressives are very pleased to hear the news of the successful ICBM Hwasong-14 conducted in the DPRK under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM is a historical victory which gives confidence and courage to the world progressives, whereas instilling fear into the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces.
					
					 We feel very satisfied that the DPRK made it possible to more firmly protect peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world by having access to tremendous nuclear deterrent and ICBM.
					
					 We will as ever extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people who are dynamically advancing along the road of socialism under the uplifted banner of self-reliance and self-development despite sanctions and blockade by the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, said that the above-said successful test serves as a great contribution to protecting global peace, extending congratulations to Kim Jong Un, who guided this test-launch to success, and the Korean people.

articles.title: British Organizations Support DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Support DPRK
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- It is the first duty of the world progressive people to defend the Korean people.
					 The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula said this in an article which was posted on internet homepage on July 5 in their joint name.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 It is the most urgent task at present to ward off a war on the Korean peninsula and achieve reunification.
					
					 We appeal to the world progressive people to extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for reunifying the country.
					
					 The world progressive people should support the national reunification movement of the Korean people and expand the struggle against the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK world-wide.
					
					 And they should intensify the joint struggle for a halt to the illegal sanctions against the DPRK and "human rights" racket against it.
					
					 Recently the U.S. imperialists are becoming ever more desperate in their moves to block the reunification of Korea and suffocate the Korean people.
					
					 We who support the independent reunification of Korea strongly demand the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Figures
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Russian figures praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at an inaugural ceremony of the Russian committee for revering the great persons of Mt Paektu held on July 17.
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said:
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the human cause of independence have been cherished in the minds of not only the Russian people but also the world people.
					
					 We will extend invariable support to the Korean people in their struggle for accelerating the building of a powerful socialist country under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un in the future, too.
					
					 The president of the Federation of International Peace Fund, who is deputy to the State Duma of Russia, highly praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the great men who made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 He stressed that no matter how desperately the U.S. and the West may work, he would boost the friendly and cooperative relations between Russia and the DPRK.
